}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Realtek#ac]] RTL8821AE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/ USB 1.1 (BT) :802.11abgn/ac 1T1R (1x1:1), DB, BT 4.0 LE, 80MHz BW
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AE TX2-RTL8821AE] (2013-07-10) :The FCC label shows two models: :• [[Realtek]] RTL8821AE (HMC) :• [[Realtek]] RTL8821AENF (NGFF) :The FCC test report states that there are six configurations of the EUT: # HMC, PCIe, Diversity antenna, I-PEX (U.FL compatible) RF connector # HMC, PCIe, Fixed antenna, I-PEX (U.FL compatible) RF connector # NGFF, PCIe, Diversity antenna, I-PEX MHF4 RF connector # NGFF, PCIe, Fixed antenna, I-PEX MHF4 RF connector # NGFF, SDIO, Diversity antenna, I-PEX MHF4 RF connector # NGFF, SDIO, Fixed antenna, I-PEX MHF4 RF connector
===Devices probably using this module=== *'''[[ASUS]]''' [http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2187428 VivoPC] (SFF PC) models (on ''Ubuntu'' forums) :• [10ec:8821/[[1043]]:85b4] PCI ID (''[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1043 ASUStek]'' subsystem) *'''[[ASUS]]''' [http://www.linlap.com/asus_transformer_book_trio_tx201la Transformer Book Trio] ([http://www.libre-software.net/ubuntu-linux-mint-on-asus-transformer-book-trio Tablet / Laptop]) :''[[ASUS TX201LA]]'' ([http://askubuntu.com/questions/384246/how-do-i-get-a-realtek-8821-wireless-card-working Card]) PCI ID • [10ec:8821] *'''[[ASUS]]''' [https://www.mail-archive.com/ubuntu-bugs@lists.ubuntu.com/msg5289704.html X550VXK] (K550V) and similar series :• [10ec:8821/[[1a3b]]:2161] (PCI ID [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1a3b 1a3b] - ''[[AzureWave]]'') *'''[[ASUS]]''' [http://forum.ubuntuusers.de/topic/treiber-fuer-wlan-modul-installieren/ M21AC] (Desktop PC) • [10ec:8821/[[1a3b]]:2161] :(PCI ID [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1a3b 1a3b] - ''[[AzureWave]]'' • [[AzureWave AW-CB161H]]) *'''ASRock''' [http://asrock.com/mb/Intel/H97M-ITXac/ H97m-ITX/ac] Motherboard • [10ec:8821] *'''ASRock''' [http://www.asrock.com/microsite/Beebox/ Beebox] (802.11ac/BT 4.0) • [10ec:8821] *'''[[Lenovo]]''' [http://askubuntu.com/questions/713750/wireless-not-available-on-lenovo-ideapad-300-15isk IdeaPad 300] Laptop ([https://dev.solus-project.com/T1328 Card]) • [10ec:8821] *'''Pioneer''' [https://www.pioneerelectronics.com/PUSA/Home/AV-Receivers/Pioneer+Receivers/VSX-1131 VSX-1131] A/V Receiver
==See also== *[[Realtek RTL8821AE Combo Module]] • [10ec:8821] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AE TX2-RTL8821AE] (2013-07-10) *[[Realtek RTL8821AU Combo Module]] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AU Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AU TX2-RTL8821AU] (2014-03-06) *[[Realtek RTL8821CE Combo Module]] • [10ec:c821] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821CE TX2-RTL8821CE] (2016-12-12)
